description: Borrowed from New Latin effiguratus; compare figurate (figuratus).

entries.meaning: (botany, lichenology) Having a definite (lobed) shape; not effuse.
examples: Thallus about 1 cm. in diameter, light gray irregular areoles 0:30,4 mm. in diameter on a black hypothallus, giving a deciussate appearance, marginal areoles slightly radially elongate and very narrowly black margined but not clearly effigurate;
